descriptor.name: Big Spicy Chicken Wrap
descriptor.short_desc: Tender and juicy chicken patty coated in spicy, crispy batter, topped with a creamy sauce, wrapped with lettuce, onions, seasoning and cheese. A BIG indulgence.
